Firstly i wish to say sorry fior the utter crap i produced in the previous release. only thing im happy about was the fix of the camera motion, perspective and close cropping.

with this being said .

So im about 2 weeks behind on this release becuase i messed up with the filters and becuase when you render in full hd it takes a LOOOONG time to do a single render
it meant the filter that took the longest but solved the problem was a catch up moment, how ever i then realized that rendering to 23.97fps REALLY fucked the footage smoothness. 
the render took close to 40 hours and then another 20 for the 2nd turn.This was to solve the bad flicker and noise issues so you didnt get the wavy walls etc.

now i fucked up becuase i was using this along with the color correction when i should have just corrected the flicker and noise before hand and becuase i didnt, i was therefore 
creating color issues, which in turn turned to horse shit..

so what you see here is 100 times better.

slight color change, flicker and noise sorted, perspective sorted, camera movement done, missing footage and also missing line sorted. Then renderd the first sharpen, then 
noise reduction and then did a final sharpen

also adjusted my previous releases edit after i did the sync and missing parts so that it didnt sound so tinny.

London Has Fallen is on its way.
